1.title: Obscurita - LACMA
1.plot: A playful spirit who has not yet mastered their awesome powers sets in motion a series of events that takes his world to the brink of disaster.

2.title: The Golden Stag - LACMA 'feat. Alice Underground'
2.plot: The Golden Stag invites you to celebrate New Year's Eve in roaring-'20s style. For one night only in L.A.'s legendary Park Plaza Hotel, return to the glamour, big bands, cocktails, dance, and utter charm of a bygone era. Let club owner Stag Jones and his bevy of broads lead you through a whirlwind evening from a gilded patio featuring live performances, cocktails, cigars, and treats to the gorgeous Grand Ballroom, where an eighteen-piece orchestra just won't quit. Downstairs, VIP Big Daddies and Leading Ladies nestle into the hotel's speakeasy for burlesque, hosted ...

3.title: Golden Stag 'Hard to Resist' - (Feat. Alice Underground)
3.plot: The Golden Stag - An exclusive speakeasy in a world of Hollywood glamour and daring adventures in the Legendary Park Plaza. Hosted by Sypher Arts Studio, the Golden Stag is an series of events telling the story of a time that never was, with live performances, original dance numbers, music and big bands playing throughout the night.

4.title: Golden Stag NYE - Happy Holidays
4.plot: Happy Holidays from the cast and crew of the GOLDEN STAG NYE CELEBRATION. Here's to an wonderful Holiday and a very Happy New Year. May 2013 be a bright year of inspiration and success for you and

5.title: Catch Me Before Midnight - Golden Stag
5.plot: Celebrate the New Year in Style with the Golden Stag, 1940's inspired NYE Celebration! We offer a whirlwind evening from the gorgeous USO Grand Ballroom, where Brent Canter and the Elliot Deutsch eighteen-piece big band orchestra just won't quit, to the spectacular LA NOIR Stage, home to serenading sirens, VIP luxuries and an wide array of acts, dancers and entertainments inspired by the excitement of Los Angeles' in the 1940's.

6.title: Golden Stag NYE - Happy Holidays Card
6.plot: Enter a world of LA Noir Styles, locked in a time of adventure and opulence. Welcome to the Golden Stag, Los Angeles. Celebrate the Holidays in the ballroom of the spectacular Park Plaza. Enjoy the warmth of an LA Noir Holiday show. Our big band orchestra heats up the night, then the sultry LA Noir Lounge features a line-up packed to the gills with serenading sirens, dance ensembles, kick lines, eye-popping solos, and wandering entertainers throughout the room.

7.title: Golden Stag 'Catch Me Before Midnight' Feat Tash Cox & Sasha Travis
7.plot: The Golden Stag - An exclusive speakeasy in a world of Hollywood glamor and daring adventures in the Legendary Park Plaza. Hosted by Sypher Arts Studio, the Golden Stag is an series of events telling the story of a time that never was, with live performances, original dance numbers, music and big bands playing throughout the night.

imdb.title: Sypher Arts Studio Presents

distributors.name: Los Angeles County Museum of Art

plot: A collection of event industrials, documentary segments, art shows and stage performances captured as only Sypher Arts Studio can. Bringing magic to every evening of art and entertainment.::Sypher Arts Studios
